regen.absent_element: situation of logging unauthorized access attempts
regen.new_specification: The system shall log all unauthorized access attempts to records, including user information and time of access attempt.
The system should ensure that all unauthorized access attempts are logged in the audit trail.
The system shall log any unauthorized access attempts to ensure a secure audit trail.

label: Unauthorised attempts to access cases must be logged in the audit trail.
absence: action of logging of unauthorised attempts to access
